mapper.select: SELECT group_no, user_no, group_location, pass_fail, group_subject, group_content, group_count, group_maxcount, startline, deadline, group_category FROM grouparticle
SELECT user_no, program_name, id, nickname, photo, location, password, point, grade FROM users

select g.group_no, g.group_location, g.group_subject, g.group_content, g.group_maxcount, u.nickname, count(m.user_no) AS count from users u, grouparticle g, groupmember m where g.user_no = u.user_no and g.group_no = m.group_no group by g.group_no,g.group_location, g.group_subject, g.group_content, g.group_maxcount , u.nickname order by group_no asc

select g.group_no GROUP_NO, g.user_no USER_NO, u.nickname NICKNAME, g.group_location GROUP_LOCATION, g.latitude, g.longitude, g.group_subject GROUP_SUBJECT, g.group_content GROUP_CONTENT, to_char(g.startline,'YYYY. MM. DD') as STARTLINE, to_char(g.deadline,'YYYY. MM. DD') as DEADLINE, g.group_maxcount GROUP_MAXCOUNT, g.group_category GROUP_CATEGORY, g.program_name PROGRAM_NAME, count(m.user_no) AS count from users u, grouparticle g, groupmember m where g.user_no = u.user_no and g.group_no = m.group_no and m.group_no = #{groupNo} group by g.group_no, g.user_no, u.nickname, g.group_location, g.latitude, g.longitude, g.group_subject, g.group_content, g.startline, g.deadline, g.group_maxcount , g.group_category, g.program_name order by group_no asc

insert into grouparticle(group_no, user_no, group_location, group_subject, group_content, group_maxcount, startline, deadline, group_category, program_name, latitude, longitude) values(#{groupNo}, #{userNo}, #{groupLocation}, #{groupSubject}, #{groupContent}, #{groupMaxcount}, #{startline}, #{deadline}, #{groupCategory}, #{programName}, #{latitude}, #{longitude})
insert into groupcomment(group_no, groupcomm_no, user_no, groupcomm_content, groupcomm_date) values(#{groupNo}, groupcomm_no_seq.NextVal, #{userNo}, #{groupcommContent}, sysdate)

select g.group_no, g.groupcomm_no, g.user_no, u.grade, u.photo, u.nickname, g.groupcomm_content, to_char(g.groupcomm_date, 'YY.MM.DD. AMHH12:MI:SS','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=KOREAN') groupcomm_date from groupcomment g , users u where g.user_no = u.user_no and g.group_no = #{groupNo} order by groupcomm_no desc

select request_page, group_no, groupcomm_no, user_no, grade, photo, nickname, groupcomm_content, groupcomm_date, groupcomm_date from (SELECT CEIL(rownum / 5) request_page, group_no, groupcomm_no, user_no, grade, photo, nickname, groupcomm_content, to_char(groupcomm_date, 'YY.MM.DD. AMHH12:MI:SS','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=KOREAN') groupcomm_date from (select rownum, g.group_no, g.groupcomm_no, g.user_no, u.grade, u.photo, u.nickname, g.groupcomm_content, g.groupcomm_date from groupcomment g , users u where g.user_no = u.user_no and g.group_no = #{groupNo} order by groupcomm_no desc)) where request_page = #{listStart}
select count(M.GROUP_NO) groupCount, g.group_maxcount groupMaxcount from groupmember m, grouparticle g where g.group_no = m.group_no and g.group_no =#{groupNo} group by M.GROUP_NO, g.group_maxcount
delete from groupmember where group_no = #{groupNo} and user_no = #{userNo}
